verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, in my prayer <S%H7879><s%>: preserve <S%H5341><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> from fear <S%H6343><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>.
Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the secret counsel <S%H5475><s%> of the wicked <S%H7489><s%>; from the insurrection <S%H7285><s%> of the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>:
Who sharpen <S%H8150><s%> their tongue <S%H3956><s%> like a sword <S%H2719><s%>, and bend <S%H1869><s%> their bows to shoot their arrows <S%H2671><s%>, even bitter <S%H4751><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>:
That they may shoot <S%H3384><s%> in secret <S%H4565><s%> at the perfect <S%H8535><s%>: suddenly <S%H6597><s%> do they shoot <S%H3384><s%> at him <S%H3372><s%>, and fear not.

They encourage <S%H2388><s%> themselves in a evil <S%H7451><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%>: they commune <S%H5608><s%> of laying <S%H2934><s%> snares <S%H4170><s%> secretly <S%H2934><s%>; they say <S%H559><s%>, Who shall see them <S%H7200><s%>?

They search out <S%H2664><s%> iniquities <S%H5766><s%>; they accomplish <S%H8552><s%> a diligent <S%H2664><s%> search <S%H2665><s%>: both the inward <S%H7130><s%> thought of every one <S%H376><s%> of them <S%H3820><s%>, and the heart, is deep <S%H6013><s%>.
But God <S%H430><s%> shall shoot <S%H3384><s%> at them with a arrow <S%H2671><s%>; suddenly <S%H6597><s%> shall they be wounded <S%H4347><s%>.
So they shall make their own tongue <S%H3956><s%> to fall <S%H3782><s%> upon themselves <S%H7200><s%>: all that see them shall flee away <S%H5074><s%>.
And all men <S%H120><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%>, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; for they shall wisely consider <S%H7919><s%> of his doing <S%H4639><s%>.

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and shall trust <S%H2620><s%> in him <S%H3477><s%>; and all the upright in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall glory <S%H1984><s%>.
